pageContext.claim: “Look at the amount of money that [Biden] has raised. Hundreds of millions. 300 million dollars one month. But I could've been the greatest of all time.I could've been the greatest political fundraiser because, as President, allI had to do was call Wall Street, the big banks. I could have called the oil companies. I could have called all of the big companies...The problem is, when they call in six months needing a favor that's worth billions, it's very hard. Especially me being a loyal person... Joe Biden works for them. I know them very well. I know them far better than he does.”
pageContext.analysis: Without evidence, Trump suggests Biden is guilty of corruption because he is raising so much more money than the president. But Biden gathered a lot of donations from small donors too. "Biden ultimately beat out Trump with both large donors and smaller contributors giving $200 or less," OpenSecrets.org reported. "He also brought in an unprecedented amount of donations from women donors. Nearly 1.9 million women donated to Biden’s campaign — compared to roughly 505,000 for Trump — accounting for 47 percent of his total fundraising." Sometimes, Trump spins a tale about he could easily raise millions of dollars with a single phone call to a corporate executive -- transactions that would violate campaign finance limits.
